key: (I still remember the last time she did to me.)
original: (I still remember the last time she did to me.)
translation: (她上次怎么对我的我可记得清清楚楚)

key: (It's time to take revenge.)
original: (It's time to take revenge.)

key: (What should I do with this unlucky person!)
original: (What should I do with this unlucky person!)

key: \C[27]Mabel\C[0]
original: \C[27]Mabel\C[0]

key: Again! Are you kidding me?
original: Again! Are you kidding me?

key: It's him again!
original: It's him again!

key: (I can ask him to save me ... Damn! Almost forgot the last time.)
original: (I can ask him to save me ... Damn! Almost forgot the last time.)
translation: (我该叫他帮忙吗！上次都那样了)

key: (Really sure, this time he won't help me again after all I've done to him.)
original: (Really sure, this time he won't help me again after all I've done to him.)
translation: (我敢肯定他这次也不会好心帮我的)

key: Hi! Sorry about last time!
original: Hi! Sorry about last time!

key: Can you forgive me and help me down, please?
original: Can you forgive me and help me down, please?
translation: 你能不能大人不记小人过，帮我下来呢？

key: (Her pleading face looks so adorable!)
original: (Her pleading face looks so adorable!)

key: (If I have never seen about those things in \C[14]Ms. Emmi\C[0]'s office.)
original: (If I have never seen about those things in \C[14]Ms. Emmi\C[0]'s office.)
translation: (要不是我亲眼见到她在\C[14]埃米(小姐)C[0]办公室抄答案)

key: (I will ignore the last time and help her without any hesitate.)
original: (I will ignore the last time and help her without any hesitate.)
translation: (我肯定脑子都不过就上去帮她了)

key: (I've already seen your final form, \C[27]Mabel\C[0])
original: (I've already seen your final form, \C[27]Mabel\C[0])
translation: (你到底是什么样子我已经一清二楚了，\C[27]梅布尔\C[0])

key: It's okay! I'll help you down right now!
original: It's okay! I'll help you down right now!
translation: 没什么！我现在就来帮你！

key: (Such an idiot! It can only be as simple as this!)
original: (Such an idiot! It can only be as simple as this!)

key: Slap
original: Slap

key: Help
original: Help

key: W-What are you doing!?
original: W-What are you doing!?

key: You're piece of shit! What the fuck are you doing?
original: You're piece of shit! What the fuck are you doing?

key: That's it! I'm calling the police! You are done for!
original: That's it! I'm calling the police! You are done for!
translation: 够了！我要叫警察了！你自找的！

key: I'm sorry! Please stop!
original: I'm sorry! Please stop!

key: Huh?
original: Huh?

key: Man! This is so fun!
original: Man! This is so fun!

key: Are you okay?
original: Are you okay?

key: (Crap! I overdo it! Hope she's okay.)
original: (Crap! I overdo it! Hope she's okay.)

key: You're gonna pay for this!
original: You're gonna pay for this!

key: Hmm... What is this sticky liquid?...
original: Hmm... What is this sticky liquid?...
translation: 嗯……这黏黏滑滑的是什么？……

key: Hey! At Least Say, "Thank You!" before leaving!
original: Hey! At Least Say, "Thank You!" before leaving!
translation: 嘿！至少你该说一句谢谢吧！

key: Meh! I guess it just a piece of clothes.
original: Meh! I guess it just a piece of clothes.

key: I'm too tired. Better go home and take a good sleep.
original: I'm too tired. Better go home and take a good sleep.

key: Couple
original: Couple

key: *Shoo* *Shoo*
original: *Shoo* *Shoo*

key: Can't you see we are working, kid?
original: Can't you see we are working, kid?
translation: 没看到我们在忙吗，小屁孩？

key: Thanks for your helping!
original: Thanks for your helping!

key: I'm glad to help you!
original: I'm glad to help you!

key: Anyway, why are you hanging up there?
original: Anyway, why are you hanging up there?

key: Uhm... I saw a cute cat in school... and I wanted to go in there and pet it...
original: Uhm... I saw a cute cat in school... and I wanted to go in there and pet it...
translation: 呃……我看到学校里有只可爱小猫猫……我想进去摸摸它……

key: (I made a loud noise as I fell. \C[25]Ms. Megan\C[0] will appear any moment, I must get out of here.)
original: (I made a loud noise as I fell. \C[25]Ms. Megan\C[0] will appear any moment, I must get out of here.)
translation: (我掉下来是弄出了好大动静，\C[25]梅根(小姐)\C[0]随时都可能出现，我得赶快溜)

key: Hey! Are you even listening?
original: Hey! Are you even listening?

key: I'm \n[1]. What is your name? Why are you so far away from me?
original: I'm \n[1]. What is your name? Why are you so far away from me?
translation: 我是\n[1]，你叫什么？你离我那么远干嘛？

key: (This guy is so annoying! No time wasting, I have to get out of here!)
original: (This guy is so annoying! No time wasting, I have to get out of here!)
translation: (这家伙真烦！没时间浪费了，准备开溜！)

key: (It's \C[25]Ms. Megan\C[0]!!!)
original: (It's \C[25]Ms. Megan\C[0]!!!)

key: (I'm too slow! I can't out run her!)
original: (I'm too slow! I can't out run her!)

key: (Exactly! I can use this idiot to buy some time for me.)
original: (Exactly! I can use this idiot to buy some time for me.)
translation: (真不错！这笨蛋能给我争取时间)

key: Hey! What are you looking at? Run!
original: Hey! What are you looking at? Run!

key: Ouch! It hurts!
original: Ouch! It hurts!

key: My face feels like burning and flatten.
original: My face feels like burning and flatten.

key: What is wrong with her? Why would she do this?
original: What is wrong with her? Why would she do this?
translation: 她搞什么？为什么这样做？

key: Hey!
original: Hey!

key: Did you try to break into the school and steal something?
original: Did you try to break into the school and steal something?
translation: 你是想闯进学校偷东西吗？

key: Wait! What!? Why would I do that?
original: Wait! What!? Why would I do that?

key: So, can you explain these noises just now?
original: So, can you explain these noises just now?
translation: 那你说说刚才是什么动静？

key: That's the sound when I fell to the ground...
original: That's the sound when I fell to the ground...
translation: 那是我摔了一跤弄出的声音……

key: You got busted and run. You were so clumsy that you fell on the ground.
original: You got busted and run. You were so clumsy that you fell on the ground.
translation: 你被我发现了就跑，然后不小心摔了一跤

key: Then, can you explain the previous sound? Like the metal noise, when someone like you tries to climb on those metal fences.
original: Then, can you explain the previous sound? Like the metal noise, when someone like you tries to climb on those metal fences.
translation: 就算你说的是真的，那之前还有一声动静怎么解释？像是你在翻栅栏时弄出的动静

key: There was a girl trapped on that fence. I just helped her get down.
original: There was a girl trapped on that fence. I just helped her get down.
translation: 有个女孩卡在栏杆上了，我想帮她下来

key: Are you out of your damn mind?
original: Are you out of your damn mind?

key: Now you're tellin' me your imagination nonexistent story?
original: Now you're tellin' me your imagination nonexistent story?
translation: 你胡编一段故事就想骗我？

key: Follow me! I need you to write something.
original: Follow me! I need you to write something.
translation: 跟我来！我要你写点东西

key: This place is bright enough. I need you to write something on here...
original: This place is bright enough. I need you to write something on here...
translation: 这里挺亮堂的，来这里签个字……

key: Wait! Ain't you the new transfer student?
original: Wait! Ain't you the new transfer student?
translation: 等等！你是那个新来的学生啊？

key: It's me. I'm moving in here not so long ago.
original: It's me. I'm moving in here not so long ago.

key: I just wanted to go for a walk and fell into this bad situation.
original: I just wanted to go for a walk and fell into this bad situation.
translation: 我就出来散散步，结果搅进麻烦事里了

key: It makes sense now. Sorry for yelling at you earlier.
original: It makes sense now. Sorry for yelling at you earlier.
translation: 现在我信你说的了，抱歉之前对你大吼大叫

key: It's okay! You're just doing your job.
original: It's okay! You're just doing your job.
translation: 没事！你只是在做你的工作罢了

key: You can go now! But don't get excited too soon! You are still on my list.
original: You can go now! But don't get excited too soon! You are still on my list.
translation: 你走吧！但别高兴得太早，我还盯着你呢！

key: If I catch you making another suspicious noise again. You're in big trouble! Understand?
original: If I catch you making another suspicious noise again. You're in big trouble! Understand?
translation: 如果下次再搞出这种怪动静，我可不会轻易放过你了！懂吗？

key: I understand. Thanks, \C[25]Ms. Megan\C[0]!
original: I understand. Thanks, \C[25]Ms. Megan\C[0]!

key: *sigh*
original: *sigh*

key: What is this unlucky day? Better check the calendar before step out of the house next time.
original: What is this unlucky day? Better check the calendar before step out of the house next time.
translation: 今天真够倒霉的，下次出门前记得要看看黄历了

key: Is he the one that \C[22]Theo\C[0]'s talking about?
original: Is he the one that \C[22]Theo\C[0]'s talking about?
translation: 他就是\C[22]希奥\C[0]说的那家伙吗？

key: I'm just a little zombie chasing a dummy man.
original: I'm just a little zombie chasing a dummy man.
translation: 我是小小僵尸，追着笨笨人儿

key: What... the fuck?
original: What... the fuck?

key: I'm faded...
original: I'm faded...

key: What the hell? Are you on drugs or something!?
original: What the hell? Are you on drugs or something!?

key: Damn, this is so embarrassing. Is he the dealer?
original: Damn, this is so embarrassing. Is he the dealer?
translation: 我去，真够尴尬的，我是认错人了吗？

key: What is the last one? Kimchi war?
original: What is the last one? Kimchi war?

key: Kimochi waruiii...?
original: Kimochi waruiii...?

key: Aeyyyyyyy.
original: Aeyyyyyyy.

original: \c[16]Tuuku\c[0]

key: Nice to meet you, bro! My name is \c[16]Tuuku\c[0].
original: Nice to meet you, bro! My name is \c[16]Tuuku\c[0].

key: Phew, it's him.
original: Phew, it's him.

key: Here is your stuff.
original: Here is your stuff.

original: \c[14]Massage Oil\c[0]\i[214] and \c[14]Massage Book\c[0]\i[230] \c[1]Acquired\c[0]

key: Thanks, man! Come back anytime.
original: Thanks, man! Come back anytime.

key: Thanks!
original: Thanks!

key: Phew, I got it. Why is this stuff so hard to get?
original: Phew, I got it. Why is this stuff so hard to get?
translation: 呼，可算拿到手了，怎么这么麻烦？

key: Doesn’t matter. Next opportunity, I’ll give Auntie a massage.
original: Doesn’t matter. Next opportunity, I’ll give Auntie a massage.
translation: 管它呢，总算能给阿姨按摩了

key: Hey! Do you need anything?
original: Hey! Do you need anything?
translation: 嘿！你有什么要的东西吗？

original: \C[25]Ms. Megan\C[0]!

original: Coming!

original: What's goin' on?

key: Hey, \C[25]Ms. Megan\C[0]!
original: Hey, \C[25]Ms. Megan\C[0]!

key: I have something to report!
original: I have something to report!

key: \n[1] has been sexually harassing me!
original: \n[1] has been sexually harassing me!

key: I find it hard to believe under my watch.
original: I find it hard to believe under my watch.

key: Unless you can prove-
original: Unless you can prove-

key: Okay!
original: Okay!

key: Come to \C[14]Ms. Emmi\C[0]'s classroom tonight!
original: Come to \C[14]Ms. Emmi\C[0]'s classroom tonight!

key: And I'll show you!
original: And I'll show you!

key: I won't let criminals wander around this school while I'm still her-
original: I won't let criminals wander around this school while I'm still her-

key: Perfect, thank you!
original: Perfect, thank you!

key: (Why are they going to be here after hours?)
original: (Why are they going to be here after hours?)

original: Mornin'!

key: HMM!
original: HMM!

key: You're wanted at the principal's office.
original: You're wanted at the principal's office.

key: Ha! Take that!
original: Ha! Take that!

original: You're in bi-

key: You too, \C[27]Mabel\C[0].
original: You too, \C[27]Mabel\C[0].

key: Ah, crap...
original: Ah, crap...

key: See, now we're in trouble!
original: See, now we're in trouble!

key: Let's go in!
original: Let's go in!

key: (He didn't ask for anything in return...)
original: (He didn't ask for anything in return...)

key: What's your angle?
original: What's your angle?

key: Hmm?
original: Hmm?

key: Whatchu mean?
original: Whatchu mean?

key: You agreed to help me steal the test answers
original: You agreed to help me steal the test answers

key: and didn't ask for anything in return.
original: and didn't ask for anything in return.

key: I just wanted to help.
original: I just wanted to help.

key: Hmm...
original: Hmm...

key: Are you... sure?
original: Are you... sure?

key: You don't want anything?
original: You don't want anything?

key: Well since you asked, how about a date?
original: Well since you asked, how about a date?

key: A date?
original: A date?

key: That's it?
original: That's it?

key: Nah, I'm good.
original: Nah, I'm good.

key: Oh, come on!
original: Oh, come on!

key: Let's get moving.
original: Let's get moving.

key: Eek, there it is!
original: Eek, there it is!

key: It came from the pool!
original: It came from the pool!

key: I heard that too!
original: I heard that too!

key: Okay, okay, stay calm!
original: Okay, okay, stay calm!

key: Let's get those answers and get the heck out of here!
original: Let's get those answers and get the heck out of here!

key: I won't argue that!
original: I won't argue that!

key: Hurry up!
original: Hurry up!

key: What took you so long!?
original: What took you so long!?

original: Okay, okay!
